from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
import time
import sys
import uselect
from aiot_rgbled import RGBLed
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

def read_terminal_input():
  spoll=uselect.poll()        # Set up an input polling object.
  spoll.register(sys.stdin, uselect.POLLIN)    # Register polling object.

  input = ''
  if spoll.poll(0):
    input = sys.stdin.read(1)

    while spoll.poll(0):
      input = input + sys.stdin.read(1)

  spoll.unregister(sys.stdin)
  return input

tiny_rgb = RGBLed(pin10.pin, 4)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def set_illustrator(ill_value):
  global ven_value, pum_value, output, temp, humid_soil, user_input, light_int, label, value, aiot_lcd1602, tiny_rgb, aiot_dht20
  if ill_value == 1:
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ff0000'))
  elif ill_value == 0:
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))

# Mô tả hàm này...
def set_ventilator(ven_value):
  global ill_value, pum_value, output, temp, humid_soil, user_input, light_int, label, value, aiot_lcd1602, tiny_rgb, aiot_dht20
  pin2.write_analog(round(translate(ven_value, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))

# Mô tả hàm này...
def set_water_pump(pum_value):
  global ill_value, ven_value, output, temp, humid_soil, user_input, light_int, label, value, aiot_lcd1602, tiny_rgb, aiot_dht20
  pin6.write_analog(round(translate(pum_value, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))

aiot_dht20 = DHT20()

# Mô tả hàm này...
def read_and_send():
  global ill_value, ven_value, pum_value, output, temp, humid_soil, user_input, light_int, label, value, aiot_lcd1602, tiny_rgb, aiot_dht20
  output = ''
  temp = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  humid_soil = round(translate((pin0.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  light_int = round(translate((pin1.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  output = str(output) + 'temperature: '
  output = str(output) + str(temp)
  output = str(output) + ', humidity: '
  output = str(output) + str(humid_soil)
  output = str(output) + ', light: '
  output = str(output) + str(light_int)
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(temp)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(humid_soil)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(8, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(light_int)
  print(output)
  time.sleep_ms(2000)

def on_button_a_pressed():
  global ill_value, ven_value, pum_value, user_input, output, label, value, temp, humid_env, humid_soil, light_int
  display.scroll((timer.get()))
  if (timer.get()) >= 5000:
    display.show(Image.SMILE)
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
  display.clear()

button_a.on_pressed = on_button_a_pressed

def on_button_b_pressed():
  global ill_value, ven_value, pum_value, user_input, output, label, value, temp, humid_env, humid_soil, light_int
  pin2.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  pin6.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))

button_b.on_pressed = on_button_b_pressed

def on_button_a_b_pressed():
  global ill_value, ven_value, pum_value, user_input, output, label, value, temp, humid_env, humid_soil, light_int
  read_and_send()

button_a.on_pressed_ab = on_button_a_b_pressed; button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1;

if True:
  aiot_lcd1602.backlight_on()
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  timer.reset()
  display.show(Image.HEART)
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
  display.clear()
  output = ''

while True:
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr((timer.get()))
  if (timer.get()) >= 5000:
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Sent!')
    timer.reset()
    read_and_send()
  user_input = read_terminal_input()
  if len(user_input) >= 5:
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Rec: ')
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(5, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr(user_input)
    label = user_input[ : 3]
    value = int((user_input[4 : ]))
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 0)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr(label)
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 0)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr(value)
    if label == 'ill':
      set_illustrator(value)
    elif label == 'ven':
      set_ventilator(value)
    elif label == 'lcd':
      pass
    elif label == 'pum':
      set_water_pump(value)
    user_input = ''
    time.sleep_ms(1000)
  time.sleep_ms(10)
